verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* when they were \w escaped|strong="G1295"\w*, \w then|strong="G5119"\w* they \w knew|strong="G1921"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* the \w island|strong="G3520"\w* was \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w Melita|strong="G3194"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the barbarous \w people|strong="G0915"\w* \w shewed|strong="G3930"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w little|strong="G5177"\w* \w kindness|strong="G5363"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* they \w kindled|strong="G0381"\w* a \w fire|strong="G4443"\w*, and \w received|strong="G4355"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* every \w one|strong="G3956"\w*, \w because|strong="G1223"\w* of the \w present|strong="G2186"\w* \w rain|strong="G5205"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w because|strong="G1223"\w* of the \w cold|strong="G5592"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* had \w gathered|strong="G4962"\w* a \w bundle|strong="G4128"\w* of \w sticks|strong="G5434"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w laid|strong="G2007"\w* \add them\add* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* the \w fire|strong="G4443"\w*, there \w came|strong="G1831"\w* a \w viper|strong="G2191"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w heat|strong="G2329"\w*, and fastened \w on|strong="G2510"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G5613"\w* the \w barbarians|strong="G0915"\w* \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w the|strong="G2342"\w* \add venomous\add* \w beast|strong="G2342"\w* \w hang|strong="G2910"\w* \w on|strong="G1537"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w*, they \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w among|strong="G4314"\w* \w themselves|strong="G0240"\w*, No \w doubt|strong="G3843"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* a \w murderer|strong="G5406"\w*, \w whom|strong="G3739"\w*, though he hath \w escaped|strong="G1295"\w* \w the|strong="G1537"\w* \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*, yet \w vengeance|strong="G1349"\w* \w suffereth|strong="G1439"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* to \w live|strong="G2198"\w*.

\w And|strong="G3767"\w* he shook \w off|strong="G0660"\w* the \w beast|strong="G2342"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w fire|strong="G4442"\w*, and \w felt|strong="G3958"\w* \w no|strong="G3762"\w* \w harm|strong="G2556"\w*.

\w Howbeit|strong="G1161"\w* they \w looked|strong="G4328"\w* when \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w should|strong="G3195"\w* have \w swollen|strong="G4092"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* fallen \w down|strong="G2667"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w* \w suddenly|strong="G0869"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* after \w they|strong="G0846"\w* had \w looked|strong="G4328"\w* a great \w while|strong="G4183"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w saw|strong="G2334"\w* \w no|strong="G3367"\w* \w harm|strong="G0824"\w* \w come|strong="G1096"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, they changed their \w minds|strong="G3328"\w*, and said \w that|strong="G3004"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w was|strong="G1511"\w* a \w god|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* the \w same|strong="G1565"\w* \w quarters|strong="G5117"\w* \w were|strong="G5225"\w* \w possessions|strong="G5564"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* the chief \w man|strong="G4413"\w* of the \w island|strong="G3520"\w*, whose \w name|strong="G3686"\w* was \w Publius|strong="G4196"\w*; \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w received|strong="G0324"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w*, and lodged \w us|strong="G3579"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w courteously|strong="G5390"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* it came to \w pass|strong="G1096"\w*, that the \w father|strong="G3962"\w* of \w Publius|strong="G4196"\w* \w lay|strong="G2621"\w* \w sick|strong="G4912"\w* of a \w fever|strong="G4446"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of a bloody \w flux|strong="G1420"\w*: \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* entered \w in|strong="G1525"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w prayed|strong="G4336"\w*, and \w laid|strong="G2007"\w* his \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* on \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, and \w healed|strong="G2390"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w So|strong="G3767"\w* when \w this|strong="G5127"\w* was \w done|strong="G1096"\w*, \w others|strong="G3062"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w diseases|strong="G0769"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w island|strong="G3520"\w*, \w came|strong="G4334"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* were \w healed|strong="G2323"\w*:

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w honoured|strong="G5091"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* with \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w honours|strong="G5092"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* when we \w departed|strong="G0321"\w*, they \w laded|strong="G2007"\w* \add us\add* with such \w things|strong="G3588"\w* as \w were|strong="G4314"\w* \w necessary|strong="G5532"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w months|strong="G3376"\w* we \w departed|strong="G0321"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* a \w ship|strong="G4143"\w* of \w Alexandria|strong="G0222"\w*, which had \w wintered|strong="G3914"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w isle|strong="G3520"\w*, whose \w sign|strong="G3902"\w* was Castor and \w Pollux|strong="G1359"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w landing|strong="G2609"\w* \w at|strong="G1519"\w* \w Syracuse|strong="G4946"\w*, we \w tarried|strong="G1961"\w* \add there\add* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*.

And from \w thence|strong="G3606"\w* we fetched a \w compass|strong="G4022"\w*, and \w came|strong="G2658"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Rhegium|strong="G4484"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* the south \w wind|strong="G3558"\w* \w blew|strong="G1920"\w*, and we \w came|strong="G2064"\w* the next \w day|strong="G1206"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Puteoli|strong="G4223"\w*:

\w Where|strong="G3757"\w* we \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, and were \w desired|strong="G3870"\w* to \w tarry|strong="G1961"\w* \w with|strong="G1909"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* we \w went|strong="G2064"\w* \w toward|strong="G1519"\w* \w Rome|strong="G4516"\w*.

And from \w thence|strong="G2547"\w*, when the \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w*, they \w came|strong="G1831"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w meet|strong="G0529"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w* as far \w as|strong="G0891"\w* \w Appii|strong="G0675"\w* \w forum|strong="G5410"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* The \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w taverns|strong="G4999"\w*: \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* when \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w saw|strong="G1492"\w*, he \w thanked|strong="G2168"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, and \w took|strong="G2983"\w* \w courage|strong="G2294"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* we \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Rome|strong="G4516"\w*, the \w centurion|strong="G1543"\w* \w delivered|strong="G3860"\w* the \w prisoners|strong="G1198"\w* to the captain of the \w guard|strong="G4759"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* was \w suffered|strong="G2010"\w* to \w dwell|strong="G3306"\w* \w by|strong="G2596"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* a \w soldier|strong="G4757"\w* that \w kept|strong="G5442"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* it came to \w pass|strong="G1096"\w*, that \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w called|strong="G4779"\w* the \w chief|strong="G4413"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w together|strong="G4779"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G5607"\w* they \w were|strong="G0846"\w* come \w together|strong="G4905"\w*, he \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Men|strong="G0435"\w* \add and\add* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, though \w I|strong="G1473"\w* have \w committed|strong="G4160"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w* \w against|strong="G1727"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w customs|strong="G1485"\w* of our \w fathers|strong="G3971"\w*, yet was I \w delivered|strong="G3860"\w* \w prisoner|strong="G1198"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* of the \w Romans|strong="G4514"\w*.

\w Who|strong="G3748"\w*, when they had \w examined|strong="G0350"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w*, would \w have|strong="G1014"\w* \w let|strong="G0630"\w* \add me\add* \w go|strong="G0630"\w*, \w because|strong="G1223"\w* there \w was|strong="G5225"\w* \w no|strong="G3367"\w* \w cause|strong="G0156"\w* of \w death|strong="G2288"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w me|strong="G1698"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* when the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* spake \w against|strong="G0483"\w* \add it\add*, I was \w constrained|strong="G0315"\w* to \w appeal|strong="G1941"\w* unto \w Cæsar|strong="G2541"\w*; \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w that|strong="G5613"\w* I \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w ought|strong="G5100"\w* to \w accuse|strong="G2723"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w nation|strong="G1484"\w* \w of|strong="G2723"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1223"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w cause|strong="G0156"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* have I \w called|strong="G3870"\w* for \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, to \w see|strong="G1492"\w* \add you\add*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to speak \w with|strong="G4354"\w* \add you\add*: because \w that|strong="G1752"\w* \w for|strong="G1063"\w* the \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* of \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w* I am bound \w with|strong="G4029"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w chain|strong="G0254"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w We|strong="G2249"\w* \w neither|strong="G3777"\w* \w received|strong="G1209"\w* \w letters|strong="G1121"\w* \w out|strong="G0575"\w* of \w Judæa|strong="G2449"\w* \w concerning|strong="G4012"\w* \w thee|strong="G4675"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3777"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* of the \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* that \w came|strong="G3854"\w* \w shewed|strong="G0518"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w spake|strong="G2980"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w harm|strong="G4190"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w thee|strong="G4675"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* we \w desire|strong="G0515"\w* to \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* \w of|strong="G3844"\w* \w thee|strong="G4675"\w* \w what|strong="G3739"\w* thou \w thinkest|strong="G5426"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w as|strong="G3303"\w* \w concerning|strong="G4012"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w sect|strong="G0139"\w*, \w we|strong="G2254"\w* \w know|strong="G1110"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* every \w where|strong="G3837"\w* it \w is|strong="G2076"\w* spoken \w against|strong="G0483"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when they had \w appointed|strong="G5021"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* a \w day|strong="G2250"\w*, there \w came|strong="G2240"\w* \w many|strong="G4119"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \add his\add* \w lodging|strong="G3578"\w*; to \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* he \w expounded|strong="G1620"\w* \w and|strong="G5037"\w* \w testified|strong="G1263"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w persuading|strong="G3982"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w concerning|strong="G4012"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w both|strong="G5037"\w* \w out|strong="G0575"\w* of the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* of \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add out of\add* the \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w*, \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w morning|strong="G4404"\w* \w till|strong="G2193"\w* \w evening|strong="G2073"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w some|strong="G3588"\w* \w believed|strong="G3982"\w* the \w things|strong="G3588"\w* which were \w spoken|strong="G3004"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w some|strong="G3588"\w* believed \w not|strong="G0569"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G5607"\w* they agreed \w not|strong="G0800"\w* \w among|strong="G4314"\w* \w themselves|strong="G0240"\w*, they \w departed|strong="G0630"\w*, after that \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* had \w spoken|strong="G2036"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w word|strong="G4487"\w*, \w Well|strong="G2573"\w* \w spake|strong="G2980"\w* the \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w Esaias|strong="G2268"\w* the \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w fathers|strong="G3962"\w*,

\w Saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Go|strong="G4198"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w this|strong="G5126"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w say|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Hearing|strong="G0189"\w* ye shall \w hear|strong="G0191"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w shall|strong="G4920"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w understand|strong="G4920"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w seeing|strong="G0991"\w* ye shall \w see|strong="G0991"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w perceive|strong="G1492"\w*:

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* the \w heart|strong="G2588"\w* of \w this|strong="G5127"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w* is waxed \w gross|strong="G3975"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* their \w ears|strong="G3775"\w* \w are|strong="G0191"\w* dull \w of|strong="G0917"\w* \w hearing|strong="G0191"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w* have they \w closed|strong="G2576"\w*; \w lest|strong="G3379"\w* they should \w see|strong="G1492"\w* \w with|strong="G3788"\w* \add their\add* \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* \w with|strong="G3775"\w* \add their\add* \w ears|strong="G3775"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w understand|strong="G4920"\w* \w with|strong="G2588"\w* \add their\add* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* should be \w converted|strong="G1994"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* I should \w heal|strong="G2390"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

Be \w it|strong="G2077"\w* \w known|strong="G1110"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* the \w salvation|strong="G4992"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* is \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* unto the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add that\add* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* will hear \w it|strong="G0191"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when \w he|strong="G0846"\w* had \w said|strong="G2036"\w* these \w words|strong="G5023"\w*, the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w departed|strong="G0565"\w*, and \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w great|strong="G4183"\w* \w reasoning|strong="G4803"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w dwelt|strong="G3306"\w* \w two|strong="G1333"\w* \w whole|strong="G3650"\w* \w years|strong="G1333"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* his \w own|strong="G2398"\w* hired \w house|strong="G3410"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w received|strong="G0588"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* that came \w in|strong="G1531"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*,

\w Preaching|strong="G2784"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w teaching|strong="G1321"\w* those \w things|strong="G3588"\w* which \w concern|strong="G4012"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w confidence|strong="G3954"\w*, no man forbidding \w him|strong="G0209"\w*.
